system.requirements:
Tier 2; BS 35, Comon Lore (Tech)
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Finesse
Veteran Talent Requirement Fulfilled
system.effect:
Veteran Talent Requirement: Character is part of a Squad that has Destroyed 3+ Enemy Vehicles in one mission
Character adds +2 to Critical Damage they deal to a Vehicle.
